channel.title: ~ Project 7 - Xaphis Isle - FINALLY POSTED ~
channel.description:
Project 7 is an older source of mine that used to be hosted with over 30,000+ accounts registered on it. It used to be very popular a few years ago. A bunch of people have emailed me wondering if I was ever going to release the source. I decided to, but I haven't taken all the screen shots, so bear with me :D
[size=18pt]PROJECT 7 - XAPHIS ISLE[/size]
[b]Project 7 - Xaphis Isle[/b] is the final edition of the Project 7 series. There have been three, but all others have been overwritten. Here are some pictures, info, and download links.
Some Details:
[code] Invisible Working Prayer (NO ICONS, but prayer seems to work on most clients) Jad Pk Full Skills, including new Rune Summoning (CREATES RUNES) Easy XP System Working special attacks, especially with godswords NEW Barrows Special Attacks, and healing Barrows with certain combinations! NEW Admin Lounge created customly by yours truly :D [/code]
Some of the commands:
[code] ::home ::starter ::pickup ::adminlounge ::pk ::jad ::cather ::3rdage ::xrichie ::sweet ::master ::rich ::god ::godoff ::eat ::capes ::theive ::makemem ::givemod ::giveadmin ::giveowner ::mute ::demote ::unmute ::ipban ::banuser [/code]
Some of the Pictures:
[img]http://blitzinkong.webs.com/photos/Project-7/p7home.jpg[/img] [img]http://blitzinkong.webs.com/photos/Project-7/p7shops.jpg[/img] [img]http://blitzinkong.webs.com/photos/Project-7/p7admin.jpg[/img] [img]http://blitzinkong.webs.com/photos/Project-7/p7pk.jpg[/img] [img]http://blitzinkong.webs.com/photos/Project-7/p7slayer.jpg[/img] [img]http://blitzinkong.webs.com/photos/Project-7/p7theive.jpg[/img] [img]http://blitzinkong.webs.com/photos/Project-7/p7train.jpg[/img]
DOWNLOAD LINK: http://uppit.com/v/4WGK5OZB
THERE IS NO CLIENT NEEDED, ITS A BASIC SOURCE. THIS WAS MADE IN THE STONEAGE OF SERVERS LOL :D
HOPE YOU GUYS LIKE IT AND HAVE FUN! GIVE CREDS IF YOU USE!!!!!

item.dc:creator: @fatwallet fatwallet
item.description:
@fatwallet wrote:

Actually, its more than an hour. I have an entire economy programmed so that you can invest in certain item stocks and watch as they grow weekly. And you can also participate in a war with one of your teams by doing ::war1, or ::war2. I put a lot of time into making this server, so give some credit for the effort!

Read full topic

item.title: ~ Project 7 - Xaphis Isle - FINALLY POSTED ~
item.dc:creator: @Ill_Pk_You Ill Pk You
item.description:
@Ill_Pk_You wrote:

[quote=“fatwallet, post:7, topic:288120”][quote author=hawkfrost57 link=topic=380930.msg2862931#msg2862931 date=1247279151]
awesome man 10/10 woot first post!
only thing is why wont ::pickup work? and ::makemem work?
[/quote]

You have to be owner for some reason, I never figured it out :S. Look it up in the client.java. And to make a player a member, you have to: if their name is Bob, you have to do ::makemembbob with 1 extra letter from the 1st letter of their name. I know its confusing, but hope it helps![/quote]

To fix that, all you do is change the

String name = command.substring(8);

to

String name = command.substring(9);

Also, alright server but I wouldn’t use. 7/10.

Repped btw.

Read full topic

item.title: ~ Project 7 - Xaphis Isle - FINALLY POSTED ~
item.dc:creator: @fatwallet fatwallet
item.description:
@fatwallet wrote:

[quote=“hawkfrost57, post:2, topic:288120”]awesome man 10/10 woot first post!
only thing is why wont ::pickup work? and ::makemem work?[/quote]

You have to be owner for some reason, I never figured it out :S. Look it up in the client.java. And to make a player a member, you have to: if their name is Bob, you have to do ::makemembbob with 1 extra letter from the 1st letter of their name. I know its confusing, but hope it helps!

Read full topic
